Description: Verify the performance score of the page
Steps: 1. Open the website. 2. Run Lighthouse tool. 3. Check the performance score.
Expected Result: The performance score should be above 90.

Expected Result: The accessibility score should be above 90.

Expected Result: JavaScript execution time should be optimized.
